bill.title: Relating to a child placement pilot program in certain counties.
bill.description: Directs Department of Human Services to establish pilot program in certain counties for continued placement of children or wards in specified child-caring agencies providing short-term assessment and stabilization services. Directs Department of Human Services to establish pilot program in certain counties for continued placement of children or wards in specified child-caring agencies providing short-term assessment and stabilization services. Permits continued placement if specified criteria are met. Requires department, in consultation with child-caring agency, to reassess appropriateness of placement at least once every 60 days. Sunsets January 2, 2029.
